gurmukhi: ੳੁਥਕੇ ਰਣ ਬੀਰਣ ਬਾਜ ਬਰੰ ॥ ਝਮਕੀ ਘਣ ਬਿੱਜੁ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾਣ ਕਰੰ ॥
transliteration: Outhke Ran Biran Baaj Baran|| Jhamkighaan Bijj(u) Kridaan Karan||
translation: The winsome horses of the warriors are jumping in the war and the sword are glistening in their hands like the flash of lightning in the clouds.

gurmukhi: ਲਹਕੇ ਰਣ ਧੀਰਣ ਬਾਣ ੳੁਰੰ ॥ ਰੰਗ ਸ੍ਰੋਣਤ ਰੱਤ ਕਢੇ ਦੁਸਰੰ ॥੨੫॥
transliteration: Lahke Ran Dhderan Baan Uran|| Ran Sronat Ratt Kadhe Dousaran||25||
translation: The arrows are seen penetrated in the waist of the warriors and they are taking out the blood of one antoher.25.

gurmukhi: ਫਹਰੰਤ ਧੁਜਾ ਥਹਰੰਤ ਭਟੰ ॥ ਨਿਰਖੰਤ ਲਜੀ ਛਬਿ ਸਯਾਮ ਘਟੰ ॥
transliteration: Phahrant Dhujaa Thahrant Bhatan|| Nirkhanndlajichhab(i) Syaam Ghatan||
translation: The flags are fluttering and the brave fighters have become fearful, seeing the glitter of the arrows and the swords, the lightning in the dark clouds is also feeling shy;

gurmukhi: ਚਮਕੰਤ ਸੁ ਬਾਣ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾਣ ਰਣੰ ॥ ਜਿਮ ਕੳੁਂਧਿਤ ਸਾਵਣ ਬਿੱਜੁ ਘਣੰ ॥੨੬॥
transliteration: Chamkant Su Baan Kridaan Ranan|| Jim Kaoundhit Saavan Bijj(u) Ghanan||26||
translation: And this scene looks like the flash of lightning in the thundering clouds of the month of Sawan.26.

gurmukhi: ਕਥਾ ਬ੍ਰਿਧ ਤੇ ਮੈ ਡਰੋ ਕਹਾਂ ਕਰੋ ਬਖਯਾਨ ॥
transliteration: Kathaa Bridh Te Mai Daro Kahaan Daro Bakhyaan||
translation: How far should I narrate the story for fear of lengthening the same;

gurmukhi: ਨਿਸਾਹੰਤ ਅਸੁਰੇਸ ਸੋ ਸਰ ਤੇ ਭਯੋ ਨਿਦਾਨ ॥੨੭॥
transliteration: Nisaahant Asures So Sar Te Bhayo Nidaan||27||
translation: Ultimately the arrows of Suraj became the reason for the end of that demon.27.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਤਿ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਬਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਨਾਟਕੇ ਸੂਰਜ ਅਵਤਾਰ ਅਸਟ ਦਸਮੋ ਅਵਤਾਰ ਸਮਾਪਤ ॥੧੮॥
transliteration: It(i) Sribachitra Naatake Sooraj Avtaar Ast Dasmo Avtaar Samaapat||18||
translation: End of the description of the Eighteenth Incarnation SURAJ in BACHITTAR NATAK.18.
Now begins the description of Chandra Incarnation:
Let Sri Bhaguti Ji (The Primal Lord) be helpful.

gurmukhi: ਫੇਰਿ ਗਨੋ ਨਿਸਰਾਜ ਬਿਚਾਰਾ ॥ ਜੈਸ ਧਰਯੋ ਅਵਤਾਰ ਮੁਰਾਰਾ ॥
transliteration: Pher(i) Gado Nisraaj Bichaaraa|| Jais Ddaryo Avtaar Muraaraa||
translation: Now I think about Chandrama, how did Vishnu manifest as Chandra incarnation?

gurmukhi: ਬਾਤ ਪੁਰਾਤਨ ਭਾਖ ਸੁਨਾੳੂਂ ॥ ਜਾ ਤੇ ਕਬ ਕੁਲ ਸਰਬ ਰਿਝਾੳੂਂ ॥੧॥
transliteration: Baat Puraatan Bhaaakh Sounaaoon|| Jaa Te Kab Kul Sarab Rijhaaoon||1||
translation: I an narriating a very ancient story, hearing which all the poets will be pleased.1.
